project.objective: EEN EASTERN FRANCE 4 INNO (EEN EF4INNO) aims to deliver innovation management services in the two new regions of Eastern France namely Bourgogne - Franche-Comte and Alsace - Champagne-Ardenne - Lorraine. These services consists in the Key Account Management of SME Instrument beneficiaries in the region assisting them throughout the project to receive proper coaching on the one hand as well as Enhanced Innovation management capacity services to SMEs with a potential to internationalize on the other hand. These services are delivered by the experts of the Enterprise Europe Network team of EEN EASTERN FRANCE
project.title: Enterprise Europe Network innovation management specific services in the two new regions of Eastern France
